content.text:
# Blue Dragon Film Award for Best Actress

}}
The Blue Dragon Film Award for Best Actress is one of the awards that is presented annually at the Blue Dragon Film Awards by Sports Chosun, which is typically held at the end of the year.
Winners and nominees
{| class="wikitable"
|+Table key
| style="background:#FAEB86; height:20px; width:20px" |
|Indicates the winner
|}
won for her role in Woman of Fire]]
won for her role in  Death Song]]
won for her role in Road to the Racetrack]]
has the most wins in this category for her roles in First Love, Dr. Bong and Tazza: The High Rollers]]
won for her role in Rosy Life]]
won for her roles in The Harmonium in My Memory, and Secret Sunshine]]
won for her role in  Ardor]]
won for her role in  Someone Special]]
won for her role in Sympathy for Lady Vengeance]]
won for her role in My Wife Got Married]]
won for her role in Midnight FM]]
won for her role in  Blind]]
won for her role in All About My Wife]]
won for her role in Cold Eyes]]
won for her role in Han Gong-ju]]
won for her role in Alice in Earnestland]]

won for her role in I Can Speak]]
won for her role in Miss Baek]]
won for her role in  Parasite]]
